com.bizosys.hsearch.index
Class Doc

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.index.Doc

public class Doc
extends java.lang.Object

Documents are the unit of indexing and search. A Document consists of:

  • Set of fields
  • Access information
  • Meta information
  • Result Display Section

    • * A document is uniquely identified by the doc merging Id (Bucket) and the document serial number inside the bucket.

    Author:
    karan
